subject: Baseball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Yankees selected infielder Dante Bichette Jr. with the 51st pick in the first round, but the son of the former All-Star outfielder was not the only relative of a major leaguer selected on the first day of the draft Monday.
snippet: The Yankees selected infielder Dante Bichette Jr. with the 51st pick in the first round, but the son of the former All-Star outfielder was not the only relative of a major leaguer selected on the first day of the draft Monday.
